S5.T2.caption: Table 2. The detailed summary of the Probabilistic Approaches
S5.T2.table:
Category Models Year Architecture Features Datasets Evaluation Tasks
Probabilistic HFT(McAuley and Leskovec, 2013) 2013 LDA ratings & reviews amazon, yelp & beer MSE & MAE accuracy & interpretability
RBLT (Tan et al., 2016) 2016 LDA ratings & reviews amazon MSE, P & R accuracy & interpretability
ALFM(Cheng et al., 2018b) 2018 topic reviews amazon & yelp RMSE accuracy
NGMM(Deng et al., 2018) 2018 NN, GMM reviews amazon MSE feature extraction
MDR (Shalom et al., 2019) 2019 LDA reviews amazon & yelp MSE accuracy & interpretability
TIM (Peña et al., 2020) 2020 LDA, MF ratings & reviews amazon & tripAdvisor Recall accuracy & interpretability
references: While all these models demonstrate enhanced recommendation accuracy, their effectiveness varies by application domain. For instance, HFT and RBLT are particularly beneficial for new products and users in e-commerce, where user history might be limited. In contrast, NGMM and the ALFM show broader applicability by also enhancing recommendations in specialized markets and for unique item groups. The detailed summary of the probabilistic models is presented in Table 2.

JRL(Chen et al., 2018b) 2017 MLP rat, img & rev amazon NDCG accuracy

ARP(Wu et al., 2019b) 2019 Attn ratings & reviews chines res. reviews MAE accuracy

ATR(Rafailidis and Crestani, 2019) 2019 adversarial net reviews amazon MSE accuracy
RACRec(Jin et al., 2020) 2020 CNN reviews amazon RMSE accuracy
RSBM(Huang et al., 2020b) 2020 CNN, Attn reviews amazon & yelp MSE accuracy
AFRAM(Li and Xu, 2020) 2020 CNN, LSTM reviews amazon MSE, MAE accuracy
AODR(Da’u et al., 2020) 2020 CNN reviews amazon MSE, RMSE accuracy
SSG(Gao et al., 2020b) 2020 CNN review amazon & yelp MAE accuracy
NCTR(Liu et al., 2021a) 2021 CNN reviews & ratings amazon & movie MSE, MAE accuracy
RPRM(Wang et al., 2021b) 2021 CNN reviews amazon P, R & M accuracy
NRCMA(Luo et al., 2021) 2021 CNN reviews amazon MSE accuracy
Acapnet(Yang et al., 2021) 2021 CNN reviews amazon MSE accuracy
MrRec(Liu et al., 2021d) 2021 CNN, Attn reviews amazon & goodreads MSE acc, diversity & cold start
SIFN(Zhang et al., 2021) 2021 Attn review amazon MSE accuracy
DRRNN(Xi et al., 2021) 2021 CNN, MLP reviews & ratings amazon RMSE data sparsity
U-ARM(Sun et al., 2021) 2021 DNN reviews amazon & yelp RMSE accuracy & interpretability
ERP(Wu et al., 2021) 2021 CNN reviews & ratings amazon & yelp MSE, RMSE accuracy
HACN(Wu et al., 2021) 2021 CNN, Attn reviews amazon MAE, RMSE accuracy
RGCL(Shuai et al., 2022) 2022 GNN, CL reviews amazon & yelp MSE accuracy
RPR(Liu et al., 2022a) 2022 CNN reviews amazon & yelp MSE & MAE accuracy
AHOR(Wang et al., 2023a) 2023 GNN reviews amazon & yelp NDCG, HR accuracy
MCCL(Wei et al., 2024) 2024 GNN & CL reviews amazon & yelp NDCG, P accuracy
references: The Lightweight Unbiased Multi-teacher Ensemble (LUME) (Xv et al., 2022) addresses computational complexity, biased recommendations, and poor generalization by implementing a multi-teacher ensemble with debiased knowledge distillation. This strategy aggregates insights from various pretrained models to form a streamlined, unbiased system that excels in generalization. The detailed summary of the deep learning-based approaches are presented in Table (Xv et al., 2022) addresses computational complexity, biased recommendations, and poor generalization by implementing a multi-teacher ensemble with debiased knowledge distillation. This strategy aggregates insights from various pretrained models to form a streamlined, unbiased system that excels in generalization. The detailed summary of the deep learning-based approaches are presented in Table 3.

S9.T5.caption: Table 5. Future Directions in Review-based Recommender Systems
S9.T5.table:
Area of Focus Proposed Directions Impact
Enhancing Interpretability and Trust Develop models linking recommendations to aspects in reviews; incorporate explanation modules. Improves user trust and satisfaction by making recommendation logic transparent and understandable.
Leveraging Multimodal Data Integrate text with images, videos, and audio to enrich user profiles and item features. Enhances depth of insights into user preferences and improves recommendation accuracy.
Leveraging Multi-criteria Rating Data Combine fine-grained aspect ratings with reviews to refine recommendations. Enhances performance and interpretability, addressing data sparsity issues.
Addressing Data Sparsity and Cold Start Use user demographics, item metadata, and transfer learning to improve new user/item recommendations. Mitigates cold start problems and enhances recommendation accuracy for new users/items.
Ethical Considerations and Bias Mitigation Develop mechanisms to detect and mitigate biases; ensure fairness and diversity. Builds trust and compliance, ensuring recommendations are equitable and unbiased.
Real-time Adaptation and Personalization Implement dynamic models that adjust recommendations based on real-time data. Keeps recommendations relevant and responsive to current user behavior and trends.
Cross-Domain Recommendations Apply domain adaptation techniques to leverage knowledge across product areas. Improves recommendation flexibility and consistency across various product categories.
Large Language Models and Recommendations Use LLMs for analyzing reviews and generating relevant suggestions. Leverages advanced NLP capabilities to enhance recommendation quality and relevance.
Responsible Recommendations Focus on privacy, diversity, and fairness in system design and operation. Ensures that recommendation systems operate responsibly, promoting user trust and societal benefit.
